entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:41 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -21.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 09:14 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -21.8°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -27.9°C
Wind: NNW 21 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
